Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Ventriloquist \Ven*tril"o*quist\, n. One who practices, or is skilled in, ventriloquism. [1913 Webster]
{Ventriloquist monkey} (Zo["o]l.), the onappo; -- so called from the character of its cry. [1913 Webster]
ventriloquist n : a performer who projects the voice into a wooden dummy
